desc: The DisplayObject elements is used as the base class for all 2D element.

width.desc: The width of the display object.

height.desc: The height of the display object.

mask.desc: The DisplayObjectElement to use as a mask.

hiddenAncestor.desc: Whether the object has a hidden ancestor.

x.desc: The vertical position of the display object.

y.desc: The horizontal position of the display object.

z.desc: The depth of the display object.

scaleX.desc: The horizontal scaling factor of the display object.

scaleY.desc: The vertical scaling factor of the display object.

scaleZ.desc: The depth scaling factor of the display object.

visible.desc: Whether the display object is visible.

alpha.desc: The alpha value of the display object.

rotationX.desc: The rotation of the display object around the x-axis, in degrees.

rotationY.desc: The rotation of the display object around the y-axis, in degrees.

rotationZ.desc: The rotation of the display object around the s-axis, in degrees.
